text: Tamagritegama eme ante'za tamazama hu'za ha'ma nehaza vahe'mo'za, rukrahe hu'za ha' huneramante'za mopatamifintira ha'reramante'za tamahenati atregahaze. Tamagranema fru huta manisanune hu'zama kema huhagerafi'naza vahe'mo'za havige hute'za tamagrira tamazeri haviza hugahaze. Tamagrama antahima nezamiza ronetamimo'za, tamagrira tamazerinaku krifu anaginte gahazanagi tamagra anazana keta antahita osugahaze.
